sense.def: Alternative Names yi li qi 疫癘氣 ; li qi 癘氣 ; wen qi 瘟氣 , warmth-illness qi; wen yi qi 瘟疫氣 , warmth-illness epidemic qi; wen yi qi 温疫氣 , warmth epidemic qi. Etiological Agent. bringing forth wen yi 瘟疫 , warmth-illness epidemics. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry ta gan 獺肝 , rou 肉：療疫氣温病 , “It heals warmth disease brought forth by epidemic qi ”. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 9: 屠蘇酒，辟疫氣 , 令人不染温病 , “ Tu su wine wards off epidemic qi and prevents a person from being affected by warmth disease”.
